<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ranger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5087) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 220 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Ranger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=215)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity +2

</column>

---

You become trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49); if you were already trained in Survival, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice. You become trained in ranger class DC.

If you gain a warden spell through this archetype, you become trained in spell attacks and spell DCs. Your spellcasting attribute is Wisdom.

You can use the [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=2257) action.

<title level="2">Ranger Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Hunter's Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=5088), [Master Spotter (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=5091), [Ranger Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=5089)
name: Ranger Dedication
